Acid.description: An attack that may lower DEFENSE.

Aeroblast.description: Has a high critical hit ratio.

AncientPower.description: An attack that may raise all stats.

Aurora Beam.description: An attack that may lower ATTACK.

Belly Drum.description: Reduces own HP to maximize ATTACK.

Bite.description: An attack that may cause flinching.

Blizzard.description: An attack that may freeze the foe.

Body Slam.description: An attack that may cause paralysis.

Bone Club.description: An attack that may cause flinching.

Bubble.description: An attack that may reduce SPEED.

BubbleBeam.description: An attack that may lower SPEED.

Confusion.description: An attack that may cause confusion.

Constrict.description: An attack that may lower SPEED.

Conversion.description: Change user's type to a move's type.

Conversion 2.description: The user's type is made resistant.

Crabhammer.description: Has a high critical hit ratio.

Cross Chop.description: Has a high critical hit ratio.

Crunch.description: An attack that may lower SPCL.DEF.

Destiny Bond.description: The foe faints if the user does.

Detect.description: Evades attack that turn. It may fail.

Disable.description: Disables the foe's most recent move.

Dizzy Punch.description: An attack that may cause confusion.

Double-Edge.description: A tackle that also hurts the user.

Dream Eater.description: Steals HP from a sleeping victim.

Earthquake.description: Tough but useless vs. flying foes.

Egg Bomb.description: Eggs are hurled at the foe.

Ember.description: An attack that may inflict a burn.

Explosion.description: Very powerful but makes user faint.

False Swipe.description: Leaves the foe with at least 1HP.

Fire Blast.description: An attack that may cause a burn.

Fire Punch.description: A fiery punch. May cause a burn.

Fire Spin.description: Traps foe in fire for 2-5 turns.

Flail.description: Stronger if the user's HP is low.

Flame Wheel.description: An attack that may cause a burn.

Flamethrower.description: An attack that may inflict a burn.

Flash.description: Blinds the foe to reduce accuracy.

Frustration.description: An attack based on lack of loyalty.

Future Sight.description: An attack that hits on 3rd turn.

Glare.description: A move that may cause paralysis.

Gust.description: Whips up a strong gust of wind.

Headbutt.description: An attack that may make foe flinch.

Hi Jump Kick.description: May miss and hurt the user.

Horn Attack.description: An attack using a horn to jab.

Hyper Fang.description: An attack that may cause flinching.

Hypnosis.description: May put the foe to sleep.

Ice Beam.description: An attack that may freeze the foe.

Ice Punch.description: An icy punch. May cause freezing.

Icy Wind.description: An icy attack that lowers SPEED.

Iron Tail.description: An attack that may reduce DEFENSE.

Karate Chop.description: Has a high critical hit ratio.

Leech Seed.description: Steals HP from the foe on every turn.

Lick.description: An attack that may cause paralysis.

Light Screen.description: Ups SPCL.DEF with a wall of light.

Lock-On.description: Ensures the next attack will hit.

Lovely Kiss.description: May cause the foe to fall asleep.

Low Kick.description: An attack that may cause flinching.

Mach Punch.description: A fast punch that lands first.

Magnitude.description: A ground attack with random power.

Mega Punch.description: A powerful punch thrown very hard.

Metal Claw.description: An attack that may up user's ATTACK.

Milk Drink.description: Restores HP by 1/2 the max HP.

Mimic.description: Copies a move used by the foe.

Mind Reader.description: Ensures the next attack will hit.

Mirror Coat.description: Counters a SPCL. ATK move double.

Night Shade.description: The user's level equals damage HP.

Nightmare.description: A sleeper loses 1/4 HP every turn.

Octazooka.description: An attack that may reduce accuracy.

Pain Split.description: Adds user & foe's HPs. Shares total.

Pay Day.description: Throws coins. Gets them back later.

Peck.description: Jabs the foe with a beak, etc.

Perish Song.description: Both user and foe faint in 3 turns.

Poison Gas.description: A move that may poison the foe.

Poison Sting.description: An attack that may poison the target.

PoisonPowder.description: A move that may poison the foe.

Powder Snow.description: An attack that may cause freezing.

Present.description: A bomb that may restore HP.

Protect.description: Foils attack that turn. It may fail.

Psybeam.description: An attack that may confuse the foe.

Psychic.description: An attack that may lower SPCL.DEF.

Quick Attack.description: Lets the user get in the first hit.

Rage.description: Raises ATTACK if the user is hit.

Razor Leaf.description: Has a high critical hit ratio.

Recover.description: Restores HP by 1/2 the max HP.

Rest.description: Sleep for 2 turns to fully recover.

Return.description: An attack that is based on loyalty.

Reversal.description: Stronger if the user's HP is low.

Roar.description: Scares wild foes to end battle.

Rock Slide.description: An attack that may cause flinching.

Rock Smash.description: An attack that may lower DEFENSE.

Sacred Fire.description: An attack that may inflict a burn.

Seismic Toss.description: The user's level equals damage HP.

Selfdestruct.description: Powerful but makes the user faint.

Shadow Ball.description: An attack that may lower SPCL.DEF.

Sharpen.description: A move that raises the user's ATTACK.

Sing.description: May cause the foe to fall asleep.

Slam.description: Slams the foe with a tail, vine, etc.

Slash.description: Has a high critical hit ratio.

Sleep Powder.description: May cause the foe to fall asleep.

Sludge.description: An attack that may poison the foe.

Sludge Bomb.description: An attack that may poison the foe.

Smog.description: An attack that may poison the foe.

Snore.description: An attack useable only while asleep.

Softboiled.description: Restores HP by 1/2 the user's max HP.

Spark.description: An attack that may cause paralysis.

Spikes.description: Hurts foes when they switch out.

Spite.description: Cuts the PP of the foe's last move.

Stomp.description: An attack that may cause flinching.

String Shot.description: A move that lowers the foe's SPEED.

Struggle.description: Used only if all PP are exhausted.

Stun Spore.description: A move that may paralyze the foe.

Submission.description: An attack that also hurts the user.

Substitute.description: Makes a decoy with 1/4 user's max HP.

Take Down.description: A tackle that also hurts the user.

Teleport.description: A move for fleeing from battle.

Thief.description: An attack that may steal a held item.

Thunder.description: An attack that may cause paralysis.

Thunder Wave.description: A move that may cause paralysis.

Thunderbolt.description: An attack that may cause paralysis.

ThunderPunch.description: An electric punch. It may paralyze.

ThunderShock.description: An attack that may cause paralysis.

Toxic.description: A poison move with increasing damage.

Transform.description: The user assumes the foe's guise.

Tri Attack.description: Fires three kinds of beams at once.

Triple Kick.description: Hits three times with rising power.

Twineedle.description: Jabs the foe twice using stingers.

Twister.description: Whips up a tornado to attack.

Vine Whip.description: Whips the foe with slender vines.

Whirlwind.description: Blows away the foe & ends battle.
